answers.answer: Patients can benefit from emergency consultations at home and unassisted medical transport activities.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/emergency-consultations and read the section under 'Home consultations and self-medical transportation'.

answers.answer: Patients or their relatives can arrange for medical transportation services by calling the 112 emergency service if the patient meets the described criteria.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/emergency-consultations and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Specialized medical transport is available for patients with severe cognitive disorders, immobile patients with tetraparesis or motor insufficiency, and bedridden patients with severe cognitive disorders, hemiparesis, or paraparesis.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/emergency-consultations and read the section under 'Home consultations and self-medical transportation'.

answers.answer: Beyond the minimum package, medical transport services include transport upon leaving the hospital, transport of immobile patients to the hospital for hospitalization, and round-trip transport to specialist offices or laboratories for bedridden patients.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/emergency-consultations and read the section under 'Home consultations and self-medical transportation'.

answers.answer: Emergency consultations at home and unassisted medical transport services are carried out by private ambulances.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/emergency-consultations and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Hospital-to-home transport can be arranged for patients with severe cognitive disorders (dementia, autistic spectrum disorders, severe or profound mental retardation) upon their discharge from the hospital.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/emergency-consultations and read the section under 'Home consultations and self-medical transportation'.

answers.answer: Transport for specialist consultations is for bedridden patients with severe cognitive disorders, hemiparesis, or paraparesis, and is for evaluation, monitoring, and prescribing treatment for chronic conditions where medication requires a specialist.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/emergency-consultations and read the section under 'Home consultations and self-medical transportation'.

answers.answer: Bedridden patients can access transport for laboratory tests by having paraclinical medical investigations recommended by family medicine doctors or specialist doctors from outpatient clinics.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/emergency-consultations and read the section under 'Home consultations and self-medical transportation'.

answers.answer: The 112 emergency service is the point of contact for arranging medical transport; its dispatcher analyzes the situation and decides which ambulance to send, and it can be called by patients, relatives, or hospital staff.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/emergency-consultations and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The provided text indicates that emergency home consultations are a service, but does not specify their exact purpose.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/emergency-consultations and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Patients are eligible for emergency home consultations if they find themselves in one of the situations described, such as having severe cognitive disorders, being immobile, or being bedridden with specific conditions.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/emergency-consultations and read the section under 'Home consultations and self-medical transportation'.

answers.answer: Health insurance companies support medical transport services by having contractual relations with the private ambulances that carry out these services.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/emergency-consultations and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The information regarding these patient rights is contained in the “Guide on the rights of people from the armed conflict zone in Ukraine in the social health insurance system”.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/emergency-consultations and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The National Health Insurance House oversees the social health insurance system related to these services.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/emergency-consultations and read the page carefully.
